action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-359, by Mr. Burgess.
Resolution provides for further amendment consideration of H.R. 8 and also provides for consideration of the conference report to accompany S. 1177.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 77.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 542.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 243 - 177 (Roll no. 653).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 181 (Roll no. 654).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 8 (North American Energy Security and Infrastructure Act of 2015) and S. 1177 (Every Student Succeeds Act).
